credit_line: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
title: M&Co:  Make it...M&Co
description: 1993-151-211a and 1993-151-211b - The design of this M&Co promotion piece features five horizontal lines of black copy, in a bold serif style, divided by thin lines; the whole is enclosed by an outline composed of the same thin lines. The introductory words, Make It, are followed by adjectives signifying the M&Co stylistic approach;  color photographic illustrations of M&Co projects are interspersed. To the left, a column headed M&Co, followed by the office address and telephone number and continuing for three quarters of the page with a list of clients and services, is imprinted in miniscule type.
name: Promotion
